AboutProjectsWhoamiBlog

Hey, My name is Mayura Andrew and I'm a 20-year-old undergraduate student from wonderfull Sri Lanka. Currently, I am pursuing Bachelor's degrees in Software Engineering and Network Engineering at The Open University of Sri Lanka and Esoft Metro Campus. I am a knowledgable and experienced Linux enthusiast with a strong passion for open-source technologies. As an open-source enthusiast, I am constantly exploring and experimenting with various technologies and tools to expand my knowledge and skills.

My passion lies in contributing to open-source projects and communities, and I am eager to be a part of the vibrant and collaborative community of contributors. With my expertise in Linux and strong understanding of web technologies, I am confident in my ability to make meaningful contributions to open-source projects. I believe that open-source is the future of software development and I am committed to being a part of this exciting and innovative movement.
